title: Phobic and panic disturbances are examples of w...

content.question: A psychologist specializes in treating patients who experience intense fear of specific objects or circumstances, often exhibited by feelings of intense fear or sensations similar to cardiovascular distress. These types of phobic and panic disturbances are examples of which of the following kinds of disorder?

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
